title: How To Find Low Competition Niches For Amazon KDP

tactics.name: Amazon Auto-Suggestions
tactics.description: Use Amazon's auto-suggestions to identify high-traffic, low-competition niches by searching for partial phrases like 'word search books for a'.
steps: Search 'word search books for a' to trigger auto-suggestions
Extract niche ideas from suggested search terms
caveats: May fail if niche is already saturated
source_quotes: There is a barrier to entry for creating word search books. You have to know how to create the word searches.

tactics.name: Amazon Search Suggestions + Book Bolt
tactics.description: Use Amazon's search suggestions and Book Bolt's keyword tool to identify niches with search volume and competition data.
steps: Use Amazon's search bar to gather initial keyword ideas
Switch to Book Bolt's Amazon keyword tool for detailed search volume data
Filter results by search volume and competition
Heart promising niches for later review
caveats: Requires paid tool for full analysis, though free trial available
source_quotes: "1,369 people per month are searching for adventure related word search books."

tactics.name: Keyword Tool Search
tactics.description: Use word search tools to find niche keyword variations and assess competition.
steps: Search for keywords using tools like Word Search Book, Word Find, and Word Puzzle
Heart (save) promising niches for later competition analysis
Check competition score and estimated monthly sales via Details feature
caveats: Tools may not reflect real-time market changes
source_quotes: 'We were able to come across four low competition niches searching for every month'

heuristics.name: Low-Review Niche Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If a niche has low review counts, prioritize it for lower competition
source_quotes: If you can find a bunch of niches that have high search traffic, but they have low competition, you can upload your books and you'll organically get sales.

heuristics.name: Volume-Driven Niche Selection
heuristics.condition: If a niche has high search volume but low competition, prioritize it
source_quotes: "If Book Bolt is picking it up and putting it in this list, there are enough buyers out there to get sales."

heuristics.name: A-Rated Niche Filter
heuristics.condition: If a niche has an A-rated competition score and over 200 estimated monthly sales, it is a low-competition opportunity
source_quotes: 'This is an A rated niche... very low competitors and a lot of estimated monthly sales'

claims.statement: Word search books have a lower barrier to entry compared to blank journals due to specialized creation skills required.
source_quotes: You have to know how to create the word searches. So what I would recommend to you is to focus on creating word search books.

claims.statement: Book Bolt provides search volume data for Amazon niches
source_quotes: "This is going to give us specifically what are people typing into Amazon that relates to word searches."

claims.statement: A-rated niches on Amazon KDP have low competition and over 200 estimated monthly sales
source_quotes: 'A rated niche... over 200 estimated monthly sales'

niche_patterns.description: Target specific demographics with unique needs that align with high search volume and low seller saturation.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines search demand with niche-specific creation barriers to reduce competition
source_quotes: If you can find a bunch of niches that have high search traffic, but they have low competition, you can upload your books and you'll organically get sales.

niche_patterns.description: Combine general interest categories with specific themes and target audiences
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances broad search volume with targeted audience needs
source_quotes: "We've got adventure word search. That would be the first one that I'd be hearting here."

niche_patterns.description: Combine popular content formats with specific, underserved topics to create low-competition niches
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages existing demand for content types while targeting underserved subtopics
source_quotes: 'Camping is another A rated niche, over 250 estimated monthly sales'
